### Tender Status

The tender for Flight Training has been expire.

### Notice Details

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Location**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* **Contact**: Ashley Kazda, ashley.kazda@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Tender Description

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) seeks proposals for the provision of Flight Training services, including aviation currency training and pilot proficiency checks by a Transport Canada certified examiner. This Advanced Contract Award Notice signals the government’s intention to issue a Standing Offer for these services to Flight Safety International.

Please note that the tender closing time has been updated to 2 p.m. EST on February 27, 2024. All required supporting documents and bid submissions must be received by this time to be considered. Any bids received after this time will be declared non-responsive.

### Additional Information

* **Procurement Category**: SRV
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Regions of Opportunity**: None
* **Regions of Delivery**: Canada

### Documents and Attachments

No documents or attachments have been provided with this notice.
